item.title: Plz help me i cant play
item.dc:creator: @taytayt123 taytayt123
item.description:
@taytayt123 wrote:

Try just using the moparscape web client,once you load it click enter then put in a working ip click login, if you don’t know what a ip is look at the top of the page where it says server status click it, put in one of the ip’s that says they are online and it should work.Much easier to just do this than to run through hundreds of files and whatnot.

Read full topic
